General.Name: Chengdu KSW Technologies Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Chengdu KSW Technologies Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of wireless channel emulators and radio frequency microwave signal generator products in China. The company provides 5G test, automated test, MIMO internet of vehicles test, wireless communication ad hoc network, radio signal acquisition and playback system solution, disaster scene communication channel simulation test, equipment performance evaluation system solutions. In addition, it offers wireless channel emulator, vector signal generator, spectrum/vector signal analyzers, vector signal transceiver, radio comprehensive tester, telemetry remote control receiver, HBI high-speed bus and modules, and special instrument. It serves mobile communication operators, equipment manufacturers, radio research institutes, aerospace science and industry, and scientific research industries. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
